about_the_game:
With the almost 23-metre-long KSA trolley of the K series, every timber transport is mastered effortlessly. Used in UK, the 33-tonne freight wagon can be loaded with a wide variety of timber. Thanks to the support for the ACS Coupling System, the wagon fits seamlessly into your train.
Different levels of dirt, detailed textures, retaining straps when fully loaded and matching sound make this wagon a 'must have' for your collection.

Features:

- KSA flat car for timber transport
- detailed PBR textures
- detailed address
- ACS compatible
- different weather conditions selectable
- matching sound
- retaining straps when fully loaded

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
